channel.title: Bernice Wicks Comics
channel.description: Recent content on Bernice Wicks Comics

item.title: About
item.description: Bernice Wicks is a settler comics creator located on the Lands of the Xwsepsum (Esquimalt) and Lekwungen (Songhees) ancestors and families. They acknowledge both the historical and ongoing injustice perpetuated by settler communities on Indigenous peoples, and recognizes that redress is necessary. Their work is an attempt to examine the parts of life that are usually passed over - wildflowers on the highway banks, cliched concepts of peace, and memorized poems.

item.title: Comics
item.description: #slide-window { position: relative; width: 278px; height: 361px; overflow: hidden; } #slides-list { width: 278px; height: 361px; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0.66s ease; -webkit-transition: all 0.66s ease; } .slide { list-style: none; position: relative; float: left; margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 278px; height: 361px; background: #ccc; text-align: center; line-height: 100%; background-size: cover; background-position: 50% 50%; color: #fff; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); -webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d; } .

item.title: main
item.description: Check out my about me page, read some comics, or take a look at a curated selection of my daily drawings.
